entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -37.4°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 40. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
